OpenStreetMap Layers
Layer.Abstract: Contains the OpenStreetMap Slippy Map Layers and the OpenStreetMap Northrhine-Westphalia WMS Data Layers. Contained layers are not active by default. Please have a look into the wms_configuration.xml
